p: We performed our meta-analysis as suggested by the Cochrane guidelines[ 11]. The PRISMA (Preferred Reporting Items of Systematic reviews and Meta-Analyses) checklist was used to standardize the details[ 12], and the PRISMA checklist is shown in S1 Table. The protocol and registration information are available at http://www.crd.york.ac.uk/PROSPERO/ (registration number: CRD42019125268).
